As a junction it has a few roadhouses that are the last generally well stocked shops of their type before the

if you are travelling on the long and desolate journey east to South Australia. Things are not necessarily cheaper here compared to Nullarbor stopping places, but they appear more plentiful on the shelves. If you have last minute checks before the crossing, now is the time and place to do it.

value: From the north on the Coolgardie Esperance Highway, from the south it is the same highway.
From the east the Eyre Highway
From the west - for the brave - there is the Hyden Norseman road, but check out about conditions before attempting in any sort of vehicle
If Lake Cowan has water - well worth checking out at vantage points close to town
